title: Dhal curry
ingredients: ['1 1/2 pints (850ml) water', '2 teaspoons ground ginger, divided', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon turmeric', 'salt (to taste)', '8 oz (225g) red lentils', '2 potatoes - peeled and diced', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 large onion, chopped', '1 small green pepper - de-seeded and chopped', '1 teaspoon garam masala (or your choice of curry powder to taste)', '1 clove of garlic - crushed', '4 tomatoes, peeled and chopped (or can of chopped tomatoes)', 'rice to serve']
